Definition 1.3 (Metric space): a metric satisfies the usual axioms.

structure MetricAxioms {X : Type*} (d : X X ) : Prop where eq_zero_iff : x y, d x y = 0 x = y comm : x y, d x y = d y x triangle : x y z, d x z d x y + d y z nonneg : x y, 0 d x y

The discrete metric on a type: if Unknown identifier `a`sorry = sorry : Propa=Unknown identifier `b`b and otherwise.

noncomputable def discreteMetric {X : Type*} (a b : X) : := @ite (a = b) (Classical.decEq ( := X) a b) 0 1
